original_text: Now the Valley of Siddim was full of bitumen pits, and as the kings of Sodom and Gomorrah fled, some fell into them, and the rest fled to the hill country.
korean_text: 싯딤 골짜기에는 역청 구덩이가 많은지라 소돔 왕과 고모라 왕이 달아날 때에 그들이 거기 빠지고 그 나머지는 산으로 도망하매

sentences.original_text: Now the Valley of Siddim was full of bitumen pits
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 싯딤 골짜기는 역청 구덩이들로 가득 차 있었다

sentences.original_text: and as the kings of Sodom and Gomorrah fled
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 소돔과 고모라 왕들이 도망할 때에

sentences.original_text: and the rest fled to the hill country.
